summary:
Nice to meet you, my name is Konstantin. I am a interim quantitative risk professional. I like to tackle complicated issues by combining different areas of knowledge such as quantitative risk management, RPA, algo trading, optimisation and machine learning. 

A positive attitude, always ready to go the extra mile. Able to bring complicated material back to basics when teaching or supervising research projects. 

I have experience with designing and implementing modelling frameworks, predictive analysis, analysing large datasets, scripting software such as Matlab, R, VBA and I have in-depth knowledge of statistics and modelling techniques. 

Special interests are implementation of AI agents for games and algorithmic trading. People praise me for my ability to combine hard skills with strong communication skills, and my ability for handling dynamic environments.
